thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Onemain Holdings Announces Proposed Senior Notes Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Onemain Holdings Announces Proposed Senior Notes Offering
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Onemain Holdings Inc:
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS INC - ‍UNIT IS PROPOSING TO OFFER UP TO $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2025​
* ONEMAIN - TO USE OFFERING PROCEEDS FOR PURPOSES INCLUDING PARTIAL REDEMPTION OF OMFH 7.250% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021​
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS INC - UNIT MAY USE PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING FOR PARTIAL REDEMPTION OF OMFH 7.250% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021 AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
